entry.value: # This example relies on ggplot2 and grid, if these packages are not part of %%00010# your R installation, please add them!%%00010require(ggplot2)%%00010require(grid)%%00010%%00010title %%00009= knime.flow.in[["title"]]%%00010%%00010color_in%%00009%%00009= knime.in[knime.flow.in[["color"]]]%%00010x_in %%00009 %%00009= knime.in[knime.flow.in[["x"]]]%%00010y_in %%00009 %%00009= knime.in[knime.flow.in[["y"]]]%%00009%%00010%%00010color = as.factor(as.matrix(color_in))%%00010x %%00009 = as.numeric(as.matrix(x_in))%%00010y%%00009 = as.numeric(as.matrix(y_in))%%00010%%00010# define a plot theme%%00010# http://docs.ggplot2.org/0.9.2.1/theme.html for more options%%00010clean_theme = theme(panel.background = element_blank(),%%00010%%00009%%00009%%00009%%00009plot.title = element_text(size=20, face="bold", colour = "black"),%%00010%%00009%%00009%%00009%%00009panel.border = element_rect(color = "white", linetype = "solid", fill = "transparent"),%%00010%%00009%%00009%%00009%%00009axis.title.x = element_text(size=18, face="italic", colour = "black"),%%00010%%00009%%00009%%00009%%00009axis.title = element_text(size=18, face="italic", colour = "black"),%%00010%%00009%%00009%%00009%%00009axis.text = element_text(size=18, face="italic", colour = "black"),%%00010%%00009%%00009%%00009%%00009axis.text.x = element_text(size=14, face="italic", colour = "black", angle = 45),%%00010%%00009%%00009%%00009%%00009legend.text = element_text(size=18, face="italic", colour = "black"),%%00010%%00009%%00009%%00009%%00009legend.title = element_text(size=18, face="italic", colour = "black"),%%00010%%00009%%00009%%00009%%00009panel.grid = element_blank()%%00010%%00009%%00009%%00009%%00009)%%00010%%00010%%00010labels = labs(list(%%00009title %%00009= knime.flow.in[["title"]], %%00010%%00009%%00009%%00009%%00009x %%00009%%00009= knime.flow.in[["x"]],%%00010%%00009%%00009%%00009%%00009y %%00009%%00009= knime.flow.in[["y"]],%%00010%%00009%%00009%%00009%%00009color %%00009= knime.flow.in[["color"]]%%00010%%00009%%00009%%00009%%00009)%%00010%%00009%%00009%%00009)%%00010%%00009%%00009%%00009%%00009%%00010qplot(x,y,color=color, geom = "path") + labels + clean_theme

entry.key: Output non numbers (NaN, Inf, -Inf) as missing cells
